verses.name: Hebrews 7:13
verses.text: For he of whom these things are spoken pertaineth to another tribe, of which no man gave attendance at the altar.

verses.name: Hebrews 7:14
verses.text: For it is evident that our Lord sprang out of Juda; of which tribe Moses spake nothing concerning priesthood.

verses.name: Hebrews 7:15
verses.text: And it is yet far more evident: for that after the similitude of Melchisedec there ariseth another priest,

verses.name: Hebrews 7:16
verses.text: Who is made, not after the law of a carnal commandment, but after the power of an endless life.

verses.name: Hebrews 7:17
verses.text: For he testifieth, Thou art a priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec.
